title: IVE BEEN CHEATED so many times by riot in ranked its not funny
body:
IVE BEEN CHEATED so many times by riot in ranked its not funny, ive seen so many trash players get free victorys thanks to riot, and now im cheated in matchmaking too, i play jg i switch one of my spells to ignite, but guess before the loading screen comes up the game crashes and when i get into the game i dont have smite, i tried but the games rigged so you jungle without smite,  thats not every single time i buy thornmail, the passive never works riot has also fixed it for the passive to be non existent , i gotten thornmail many times to prove it, but you know what riot support says to me about, absolutely nothing, they cheat and they know they cheat but they keep doing it cause they know they can get away with it, and ive got so much proof they cheat too, 
and honestly i think riot should be sued and everyone thats works there should be banned from the gaming industry, this is a warning riots fixes ranked

replies.body:
Wow how original a bronze blaming anyone but himself for ranked losses
